content: गभीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गच्छति जलमत्र, गम् ईरन् भांतादेशश्च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 35</ls>] {@--1@} Deep (in all senses); उ त्तालास्त इमे गभीरपयसः पुण्याः सरित्संगमाः <ls>U. 2. 30</ls>; <ls>Bv. 2. 105.</ls> {@--2@} Deepsounding (as a drum). {@--3@} Thick, dense, impervious (as a forest). {@--4@} Profound, sagacious. {@--5@} Grave, serious, solemn, earnest. {@--6@} Secret, mysterious. {@--7@} Inscrutable, difficult to be perceived or understood.
